welcome_message_body: Welcome to Gateshead, where you'll find a perfect blend of historic charm and modern attractions. Explore our iconic landmarks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals as you enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Newcastle Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Newcastle Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
